column4: I installed and reinstalled the Forecastfox 0.8.5.3 on Firefox 1.0.7 but it won't work. There is a small box down in the status bar between Fasterfox and Adblock that I think is supposed to be the extension. Any ideas?
state the issue and someone will try and help if they can
you can use the arrow up key to see a "history" of commands you ran
